title: [root] VR Tap for Wear
summary: Tap your phone's screen from your wear watch, perfect for cardboard VR games
developerAddress:
The internet
AFK: Calle Timoteo Padros 14, 28200 El Escorial, Madrid, Spain
description: This app allows you to generate a tap on your phone's screen by using your android wear watch as a remote, this is a good option for cardboard games since you can use the watch as a remote and not the magnet/stick your finger inside.non-root accessibility option coming soon!
descriptionHTML:
This app allows you to generate a tap on your phone's screen by using your android wear watch as a remote, this is a good option for cardboard games since you can use the watch as a remote and not the magnet/stick your finger inside.

non-root accessibility option coming soon!
comments: Doesn't work on my LG smart watch, it seems like a jpg app, suspiciously fake
